backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report detailing implemented frontend features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend source files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/public/404.html: Redirect page that routes all unknown paths back to root for SPA behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing, mood pages, and a custom 404 view.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders chat messages with sender info and text, audio, or video content.
Chat message list with initial scroll-to-top and staggered slide-up animations.
frontend/src/components/FooterActions.ts: Footer buttons triggering placeholder playlist and globe click handlers.
frontend/src/components/GifCarousel.tsx: Auto-cycling GIF carousel with fade transitions and indicator controls.
frontend/src/components/OpenWhenGrid.tsx: Grid of mood cards that navigate via click and display icon and title.
frontend/src/components/PoemReveal.tsx: Scroll-triggered poem section revealing lines with staggered animations.
frontend/src/data.ts: Type definitions and mock data for hero GIFs, poems, and mood sections with messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using react-query, updating it when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, and logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode settings, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the birthday landing page with GIF carousel, poem reveal, mood navigation grid, and footer.
frontend/src/pages/MoodPage.tsx: Displays a themed mood page with header and chat thread; shows a fallback when slug is invalid.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, goals, features, and architectural notes for the birthday website.
